titles: October the 22. 1649. The three-penny cooks fat in the fire, or rhe [sic] downefall of as-in-presentis; or the schoole-master under the black-rod. Or the brain-breakers breaker newly broke out againe. By Thomas Grantham, master in art of Peter-house in Cambridge, heretofore professor in Bowlane and Mug-well-street neere Barber Chyrurgions Hall: now over against Graies Inn Gate in Holborne, at Master Bulls.
author: Grantham, Thomas, d. 1664.
publisher: Printed for Thomas Pabody, in Queenes-head-alley, in Pater-noster-row,
notes: An advertisement of a new method of teaching Greek and Latin. [Thomason catalog].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Latin language --  Study and teaching --  Early works to 1800.
Greek language --  Study and teaching --  Early works to 1800.
